name: Dark (itch) (AdenMansonGames)
description:
You are placed in a world, a strange world. A world like no others. A world without light. You must make your way around this world, collecting keys to restore light. Take the challenge and see if you can beat the darkness...

If you upload gameplay of the 'early access' version and email the link to the video at adenmansongames@gmail.com you will recieve free access to the full game upon release. Please note you must link the official page/s in your video:

http://adenmansongames.itch.io/dark

or

http://gamejolt.com/games/dark/112027
